channel.title: Microsoft Teams on Microsoft 365 Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft Teams on Microsoft 365 Community Blog

item.title: Make a bot for simple interactions in Teams using a Webhook
item.description: Introduction Have you ever had an idea to ask a bot to perform a simple interaction?

item.title: Quickly set up Viva Connections app in Microsoft Teams using Teams admin center
item.description: As we all know, Viva connection is a part of Employee Experience Platform.

item.title: ProvisionGenie - an open-source provisioning engine for Microsoft Teams
item.description: Once upon a time I teamed up with my friend and partner in crime Carmen Ysewijn.

item.title: Azure Meeting Bot To Capture Meeting Participants Information
item.description: In this article, we will learn about how to create Azure Meeting Bot which can join a team meeting via Power Automate and can log participant’s information.

item.title: Do you need ngrok to develop Microsoft Teams apps?
item.description: If you’ve started down the path of developing applications for Microsoft Teams, you may have seen a tool called ngrok as a prerequisite in various tutorials and lab exercises.

item.title: Setting up https for Teams Tabs projects - without ngrok
item.description: I’ve started using the new Microsoft Teams toolkit, which is a Visual Studio Code extension and generator for Teams applications.

item.title: Let's build a timer app for teams meetings
item.description: Introduction Wouldn’t it be nice to have a timer at meetings, so that everybody can see how much time has passed and how much is remaining?

item.title: Using Power Automate And Graph API To Manage External Access To Teams
item.description: Matt Collins Jones and I presented API’s – The most powerful tool, anyone can use!

item.title: Simple reminders for any Teams Channel or Chat message
item.description: Forgetting to take action on a message, or where that message was?

item.title: Teams - an adoption idea? Transfer your group chat emails to Teams with Power Automate
item.description: Transfer your group chat emails to Teams with Power Automate

item.title: Change your own profile picture as a Guest in Microsoft Teams
item.description: I love Microsoft Teams and I also love controlling my online appearance, but sadly both aren’t big friends when you are a Guest in another tenant.

item.title: Start building apps for Teams
item.description: Microsoft Teams is a rich collaboration platform used by millions of people every day.

item.title: How to create an improved Microsoft Teams Files approval process using Azure Logic Apps
item.description: We are all there during some days: Power Automate Premium is the key to the next level but there is no way we could justify that licensing – the ROI is simply not enough.

item.title: How to use Microsoft Teams app templates
item.description: Microsoft Teams can be extended in several different ways using no-code, low-code and custom code solutions.

item.title: How to configure and use Incoming Webhooks in Microsoft Teams
item.description: Intro Incoming webhooks are a way to send updates or messages in a channel in Teams without a user interface, typically done via scripts or code programmatically.
